code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Login from'./pages/Login';import QuizPage from'./pages/QuizPage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){const[token,setToken]=useState(localStorage.getItem('token'));const[userId,setUserId]=useState(localStorage.getItem('userId'));const[name,setName]=useState(localStorage.getItem('name'));function onLogin(_ref){let{token,userId,name}=_ref;localStorage.setItem('token',token);localStorage.setItem('userId',userId);localStorage.setItem('name',name);setToken(token);setUserId(userId);setName(name);}if(!token){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:onLogin});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuizPage,{token:token,userId:userId,name:name});}
